\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 71550}

\subsection*{Relaxed Anus}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Malikcalypse}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated & oral & Alcohol - Hard & liquid\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Cannabis & plant material\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 20 mg & rectal & Pharms - Cyclobenzaprine & ground / crushed\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 125.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Around 4AM I crushed 2x10mg pill. After imagining ways to administer an anal suppository, I decided on just sticking my finger in. Had been drinking whisky and smoked a joint before I tried it. After a short burn sensation in my ass, my body is numb and everything elevated. I kept going back to the washroom to add small amounts for about 2 hrs, having a shot every now and then. Mostly enjoyed it because I was high, watched porn and fucked my ass easy. I think my girlfriend might be convinced that this is the way to try anal.
